    • Uses of GamePlay in com.risk.model.Strategy

      Fields in com.risk.model.Strategy declared as GamePlay

      private GamePlay CheaterTest.game_play

      Methods in com.risk.model.Strategy that return GamePlay 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GamePlay Random.attack(GamePlay game_play)
      Attack for a Random Player as per Strategy Design Pattern.This player attacks a random number of times a random country.
      GamePlay Human.attack(GamePlay game_play)
      Attack for a Human Player as per Strategy Design Pattern.
      GamePlay Cheater.attack(GamePlay game_play)
      Attack for a Cheater Player as per Strategy Design Pattern.This Player automatically conquers all the neighbors of all its countries.
      GamePlay Benevolent.attack(GamePlay game_play)
      Benevolent Player never believes to attack any of his opponent
      GamePlay Aggressive.attack(GamePlay game_play)
      Attack for an Aggressive Player as per Strategy Design Pattern.This Player main goal is always attack with strongest territory until it cannot attack anymore.
      GamePlay Random.fortify(GamePlay game_play)
      Fortify for a Random Player as per Strategy Design Pattern.This function is use by random player to fortify armies from source to territory by selecting random source and any of its random neighbors
      GamePlay Human.fortify(GamePlay game_play)
      Fortify for a Human Player as per Strategy Design Pattern.
      GamePlay Cheater.fortify(GamePlay game_play)
      Fortify for a Cheater Player as per Strategy Design Pattern.This player doubles the number of armies on its countries that have neighbors that belong to other players.
      GamePlay Benevolent.fortify(GamePlay game_play)
      Fortify for a Benevolent Player as per Strategy Design Pattern.
      GamePlay Aggressive.fortify(GamePlay game_play)
      Fortify for a Aggressive Player as per Strategy Design Pattern..Focus on aggregating armies on one country.
      GamePlay Random.reinforce(GamePlay game_play)
      Reinforce for a Random Player as per Strategy Design Pattern.This function is use by random player to reinforce armies on any randomly selected territory with given army stock
      GamePlay Human.reinforce(GamePlay game_play)
      Reinforcement for a Human Player as per Strategy Design Pattern.
      GamePlay Cheater.reinforce(GamePlay game_play)
      Reinforcement for a Cheater Player as per Strategy Design Pattern.This Player doubles the number of armies on all its countries.
      GamePlay Benevolent.reinforce(GamePlay game_play)
      Reinforcement for a Benevolent Player as per Strategy Design Pattern.
      GamePlay Aggressive.reinforce(GamePlay game_play)
      Reinforcement for a Aggressive Player as per Strategy Design Pattern.
